short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatic Do-Not-Disturb for SMART Wifi bulbs and other devices running Tasmota with Google Meet integration.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically toggle or adjust your SMART Wifi devices on and off during meetings. Works with Google Meet and Tasmota. This is an open source project, contributions are welcome.
